title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Unleash the power of learning with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This award-winning kit is perfect for budding scientists in grades 3-6, ages 8 and up. With 25 guided STEM experiments and a 48-page color student guide, your child will dive into the exciting world of electricity and magnetism.

Watch as they explore the wonders of electric motors and generators, all while learning about magnetic fields and electric currents. This kit features a battery-powered motor that can be reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, providing hands-on learning experiences that are both educational and fun.

Winner of the Parents' Choice Silver Award, this kit is designed to engage young minds and inspire a love for science. With transparent plastic components and detailed instructions, your child will be immersed in the world of STEM as they build circuits, experiment with magnets, and learn about gears and drive-trains.

Get your child excited about science with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. Order now and spark their curiosity today!

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, a hands-on learning experience that will spark your child's curiosity and passion for STEM! With 25 guided experiments, a 48-page color student guide, and a Parents' Choice Silver Award, this kit is perfect for children in grades 3-6, ages 8 and up.

Watch as your child explores the world of electricity and magnetism with an electric motor made of transparent plastic and the ability to switch to a hand-crank electric generator. They will learn about magnetic fields, electric currents, circuits, gears, and drive-trains through fun and engaging experiments.

With dimensions of 13.1 x 8.9 x 2.6 inches and weighing only 1.3 pounds, this kit is perfect for at-home or on-the-go learning. Let your child's imagination run wild as they discover the wonders of motors and generators with this award-winning science kit. Buy now and watch your child's love for science grow!
